body.name: St. Ives Blackhead Clearing Face Scrub Clears Blackheads & Unclogs Pores Green Tea & Bamboo With Oil-Free Salicylic Acid Acne Medication, Made with 100% Natural Exfoliants 6 oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 23 hrs 6 mins
features: NATURAL EXFOLIANTS: This face scrub is made with 100% natural exfoliants (walnut shell powder and bamboo powder) and salicylic acid to buff away dead skin and unclog pores for clear, radiant skin.
MODERATE EXFOLIATION: This face scrub has a moderate exfoliation factor to help clear pores. Our walnut shell powder is finely polished, so it exfoliates only the outer layers of dead skin cells.
BYE-BYE BREAKOUTS: St. Ives Blackhead Clearing Face Scrub contains 1% salicylic acid, which helps clear skin of blackheads and acne.
TACKLE MASKNE: Adding this deep cleaning face scrub to your routine along with replacing and washing your protective face masks frequently are some ways to prevent acne from face masks.
NATURAL GLOW: St. Ives face scrubs are made with 100% natural exfoliants to even skin tone and leave skin clear, soft, and glowing.
body.description: Our Blackhead Clearing Green Tea Face Scrub helps unclog pores and clear blackheads. From America’s No. 1 scrub brand*, duh. A derma‐tested, blackhead‐tackling scrub made with salicylic acid. It moderately exfoliates, helping to clear blackheads, and unclog pores, for a more even skin tone. It’s also infused with olive leaf extract which the Egyptians saw as a symbol of heavenly power. And who’d argue with that? Our green tea leaves come from China and are processed in the traditional Chinese way. This involves heating them to stop oxidation so they stay that lovely vibrant green color. The goodness is then extracted by very gently by soaking them. It takes a little longer but we think it’s worth it. Natural Ingredients Green Tea Extract Olive Leaf Extract Hydrated Silica Tell me more! This refreshing scrub is oil free, paraben free, dermatologist tested, and non-comedogenic (meaning won’t clog pores), and has a moderate exfoliation level. It also contains 1% salicylic acid acne medication. How to use: Dispense scrub onto fingertips and massage onto damp skin. Spread in small circular motions to wake your skin’s natural circulation. When you’re done, rinse and glow! For best results, use 3-4 times a week. *Based on 52 week unit sales ending 7.30.16

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: At a Glance: Contains 1% salicylic acid to helps clear blackheads and calm redness Made with 100% natural exfoliants and helps unclogs pores* Our green tea leaves are carefully picked from China Oil Free St. Ives Blackhead Clearing Face Scrub Green Tea 6 oz Unclog Your Pores For a More Even Skin Tone St. Ives Fresh Skin Face Scrub Apricot is America's favorite scrub brand*, this multi-award winner contains natural walnut shell powder to deeply exfoliate for clean, glowing skin**. Our Apricots and Walnuts come from sun-drenched California and North Africa so our natural exfoliants like walnut shell powder and apricot fruit extract, help leave skin feeling super soft and smooth**. This is a 3‐4 time a week kind of a scrub, for refreshed, glowing skin.

St. Ives: Get to Know Us Want to know how to get glowing skin? You’ve come to the perfect place. Our products were all made to bring the joy of nature to your skin while making it glow- all without crossing into shiny skin territory (not cute). That’s why our entire lineup features natural moisturizers, exfoliants, and extracts**! We also just really, really love apricots. Think of St. Ives as your go-to for great-smelling cleansers, lotions, masks, and body washes you can use on the daily to get glowing skin that feels super-hydrated and oh-so-silky smooth.

The Science of Exfoliation Did you know your skin is constantly renewing itself? Basically, your body is always making new skin cells: while you sleep, while you eat, during class or morning status meetings at work- you get the point! However, the process isn’t perfect. Sometimes these old cells don’t flake off quickly enough; this build-up can leave you with a rough, dull, tired-looking complexions. Enter the exfoliating face scrub! Used correctly, these deep facial cleansers can help boost radiance by gently buffing away leftover dead skin cells. Properly exfoliated skin looks fresher, smoother, and downright glow-ier. Now go forth and exfoliate responsibly with one of our face scrubs, make with natural exfoliants**! **Claim based on the ingredients used in the manufacturing of the product. Note: For detailed ingredient list, please check the manufacturer website.

How to Use 1. Squeeze a dime sized amount of St. Ives Fresh Skin Face Scrub Apricot onto your fingertips and massage into damp skin. Spread in small circular motions, applying gentle pressure to wake your skin’s natural circulation. 2. Work all over, right up to your hairline and onto the sides of your nose. 3. When you’re done, rinse and pat dry with a clean towel. Use 3-4 times a week for best results.

St. Ives Fresh Skin Face Scrub Apricot 6 oz St. Ives Acne Control Face Scrub Apricot 6 oz St. Ives Radiant Skin Face Scrub Pink Lemon and Mandarin Orange 6 oz St. Ives Gentle Smoothing Face Scrub and Mask Oatmeal 6 oz St. Ives Blackhead Clearing Face Scrub Green Tea 6 oz St. Ives Exfoliate & Nourish Facial Oil Scrub Coconut 4.23 oz Gentle Exfoliation ✓ Moderation Exfoliation ✓ ✓ ✓ Deep Exfoliation ✓ ✓ Provides Instant Nourishment ✓ Helps Fight or Prevent Acne ✓ ✓

I used 2 times a week for 4 weeks and really see a big difference in texture and cleaning. Also is more natural compare to others pfoducts with less effectiveness. If you create a routine you will notice big difference. No doubt about it.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effective exfoliating scrub
reviews.reviewText: This scrub gently exfoliates and makes my skin feel cleaner without drying it out. One bottle lasts a while, and with how effective of a cleanser it is, it's a really good value in my opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: You get what you pay for. I notice with the more expensive brands they work better and faster than this one.

No he visto los resultados a largo plazo, lo acabo de comprar pero, ya enseguida noto lo agradable que es el aroma y textura. Es un exfoliante fino en cuanto a que los grumos se sienten como arena de jardín zen, muy fina; diferente a otros exfoliantes, que parecen azúcar. El aroma se distingue pero no es empalagoso, relaja y refresca tanto la piel como el olfato. Se enjuaga fácil y no deja la sensación de ardor o frío, recomiendo poner crema hidratante sin olor después de su uso
Such a wonderful scrub. Just the right amount of grit and creaminess mixed together
Worth a buy. Delivered in good condition, nicely packed and it was the exact original face wash product ordered.

reviews.reviewText: Smells great, not too harsh but does a great job. I have oily skin and my skin doesn’t feels very refreshed after use. Also I found my skin better prepped for make up after using this. I love it and will buy more.
